articles.title: National Meeting Marks 64th Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 64th Birthday of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Saturday to celebrate the 64th birthday of the DPRK.
					 Present there were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and Choe Ryong Hae, officials of the party, armed forces, power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, chairpersons of friendly parties, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, labor innovators and other people in Pyongyang. Overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-imperialist National Democratic Front also attended.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of different countries, members of the military attaches corps and representatives of international organizations here and foreign guests.
					
					 Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made a report.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The founding of the DPRK on Sept. 9, 1948 by President Kim Il Sung was a solemn declaration of the birth of people's Korea, the first people's country in the colonial East, and a great event which opened a new era of building the socialist state centered on the popular masses.
					
					 The founding of the DPRK made the country which had been eclipsed on the world map emerge as a legitimate independent and sovereign state in the international arena and enabled the Korean people to become masters of the country and the society for the first time in the history. It also helped them have a powerful political weapon to victoriously accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il who remained loyal to the President's idea and cause of nation-building put forth the original theory of nation-building based on the revolutionary outlook on the leader and led the drive for carrying them out, thus strengthening the DPRK into the country of the President in name and reality.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made sure that Kim Il Sung was held in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK and led the efforts to solve all the problems arising in nation-building and activities the way the President did and as intended by him. This was a distinguished feat that provided a firm guarantee for glorifying the DPRK as the state of Kim Il Sung and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche to the last.
					
					 Kim Jong Il put forward the Songun politics as the basic political mode of the DPRK in the most grim period of the Korean revolution and established the state mechanism with a main emphasis on national defence. He also increased the nation's capabilities and smashed the imperialists' moves for aggression, thereby firmly defending the destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un named patriotism personally showed by Kim Jong Il on the road of devotion to defending the country and the prosperity Kim Jong Il's patriotism and aroused the army and the people to embody it.
					
					 The Korean people will meet vicious challenges and obstructions of anti-reunification forces at home and abroad and certainly achieve the historic cause of the country's reunification by the concerted efforts of all compatriots under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 It is the principled stand and firm will of the DPRK to answer the provocation and the war for aggression with immediate counter-attack and the sacred and just war for the country's reunification.
					
					 If a war breaks out again on this land against the will of the Koreans due to the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces, the army and the people of the DPRK will not miss the chance but promptly deal deadly blows at them and lead it to a sacred war for national reunification. By doing so, they will realize the greatest desire of the nation and remove the stronghold of imperialism from the earth, the reporter concluded.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Hu Jintao
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, and Choe Yong Rim, premier of the Cabinet, received a message of greeting sent by Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, president of the People's Republic of China and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC, together with Wu Bangguo, chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, and Wen Jiabao, premier of the  State Council, on Saturday.
					The message said:
					
					 We send warm congratulations to you and, through you, to the WPK, the DPRK government and fraternal Korean people on behalf of the CPC and government and people of China on the 64th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					
					 After the founding of the DPRK the Korean people embarked upon the genuine road of building a socialist state and recorded a new page in the Korean history. 
					
					 They have achieved laudable successes in the cause of building a socialist country of Korean style for over 60 years under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the WPK.
					
					 They are vigorously hastening the building of a thriving nation by exploring ways in a go-ahead manner with redoubled efforts, united close around Comrade Kim Jong Un and the WPK.
					
					 We sincerely wish the DPRK steady, fresh and greater success in all domains.
					
					 China and the DPRK are friendly neighbors linked with the same mountain and rivers.
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK friendship provided and cultivated by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries is growing stronger as the days go by and displaying fresh vitality in the new period and under the new situation.
					
					 We, together with the DPRK side, will contribute to bringing greater wellbeing to the peoples of the two countries and achieving lasting stability, prosperity and development of the region by deepening the substantial exchange and cooperation in every field of both countries and promoting the deepening and development of the Sino-DPRK relations, in the spirit of "inheriting the tradition, facing up to the future, building good-neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation". 
					
					 We wish the DPRK prosperity and its people happiness.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ethiopian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ethiopian President
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Ethiopian President Girma Wolde-Giorgis on August 30.
					  The president in the message extended on behalf of the government and people of Ethiopia and on his own behalf warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the government and people of the DPRK on the occasion of the national day of the DPRK.
					
					 Availing himself of the opportunity, he sincerely wished Kim Jong Un happiness and the friendly people of the DPRK peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulations to Algerian PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Algerian PM
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Premier Choe Yong Rim Friday sent a congratulatory message to Abdelmalik Sellal upon his appointment as prime minister of Algeria.
					 Expressing belief that the long-standing good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to grow strong in the future, too, the message sincerely wished the prime minister success in his responsible work for the country's development and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK Armed Forces Minister Meets Cuban Military Delegation
articles.content:
DPRK Armed Forces Minister Meets Cuban Military Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Gak, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Saturday met and conversed with the Cuban military delegation of the Revolutionary Armed Forces led by its Vice-Minister Joaquin Quintas Sola.
					 Present there were KPA generals and officers and the Cuban ambassador and a military attache of the Cuban embassy here.
					
					 The head asked Kim Jong Gak for conveying the greetings Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, sent to Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 He expressed his will to make contribution to further developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the armies and peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Kim Jong Un from Belarusian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Kim Jong Un from Belarusian President
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un on Sept. 4 received a message of sympathy from Belarusian President Aleksandr Lukashenko.
					 The president in the message said that he heard the sad news that flood caused by typhoon hit the DPRK, claiming heavy casualties. He expressed deep sympathy to Kim Jong Un and bereaved families of the victims on behalf of the Belarusian people and president.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Cuban Military Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba.
					 The gift was conveyed Saturday to Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Gak, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Joaquin Quintas Sola, vice-minister of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba who is heading the delegation. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the gift sent by Leopoldo Cintra Frias, minister of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba to Kim Jong Un was conveyed.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Guests
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Guests
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from Vishwanath, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 64th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Vishwanath handed it to an official concerned Saturday.
					
					 Earlier, gifts presented to Kim Jong Un in the joint name of the delegations of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development and the Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun and by the chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Politics were separately handed to an official concerned.
					
					 A gift was also presented to Kim Jong Un by the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan.

articles.title: Vishwanath Visits Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Vishwanath Visits Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, Saturday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK to express his respects.

articles.title: AINDF Pays Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
AINDF Pays Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) Jo Il Min and its members Saturday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill. They paid homage after laying a floral basket before the statues on the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.

articles.title: Cuban Military Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Cuban Military Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The military delegation of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba led by Vice-Minister Joaquin Quintas Sola visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home in Mangyongdae, the guests looked round the relics, being briefed on the immortal revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung and his patriotic and revolutionary family members.
					
					 At the end of the visit, the head of the delegation said that he deemed it honor to visit Mangyongdae.
					
					 He said that the visit helped him know the boundless reverence of the Korean people for the President. 
					
					 They also visited the Museum of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army and enjoyed the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang".

articles.title: Laotian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Laotian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Commission for Propaganda and Training Affairs of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party led by Its Vice-Chairman Sisouk Philavong visited Mangyongdae.
					 At the old home of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae, they looked round historic relics preserved there with care, being briefed on the story associated with that historic home.
					
					 Then they climbed Mangyong Hill to tour historic sites.
					
					 The head of the delegation wrote in a visitor's book that he got to know better about the great career of the President.
					
					 He also wished the fraternal Korean people bigger success in building a thriving socialist nation under banner of Juche idea.
					
					 In the meantime, the delegation visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, Museum of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, Pyongyang Hosiery Factory, Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm, etc.

articles.title: Mosaics Depicting Smiling Portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected at Several Units
articles.content:
Mosaics Depicting Smiling Portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected at Several Units
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Mosaics depicting portraits of smiling great persons "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" and "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" have been erected at several units.
					 Their erection is the expression of fixed will of the officials and workers to hold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever.
					
					 Chongjin City of North Hamgyong Province and Rason City erected mosaics with a will to add shine to the leadership feats of them who continuously visited the northern tip of Korea to indicate the road to advance.
					
					 The officials and workers of Phyongsong and Anju Cities and Songchon County of South Phyongan Province and Haeju City of South Hwanghae Province made great devotion to setting up mosaics of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il with ardent yearning for them.
					
					 The workers of Huichon City, Songgan County, Hwaphyong County and Usi County of Jagang Province devoted their sincerity to the building of mosaics to hand down the great benevolence of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Unveiling ceremonies were held at the relevant units.

articles.title: Korean People Make Change: Ex-Chinese Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Korean People Make Change: Ex-Chinese Ambassador to DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Wan Yongxiang, ex-Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, expressed his impression as follows after witnessing Korean people's struggle for building a thriving nation:
					 We laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					
					 The President was born in a simple thatched house and devoted his all for the country and people.
					
					 He made a great contribution to protecting global peace.
					
					 The Korean people are successfully realizing his behests.
					
					 They overcame difficulties and struggled for the hopeful tomorrow despite. They are stepping up the building of a thriving nation by displaying tremendous mentality, firmly united around the leader.
					
					 In that period they made great success in various fields.
					
					 The DPRK is proud of its might as a socialist power today.
					
					 I was deeply impressed by the Pyongyang streets that have changed beyond recognition and faces of Korean people full of vigor.
					
					 The Korean people are creating great changes with mighty of single-minded unity.
					
					 All the successes in the DPRK are a fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 I hope that they will achieve greater success under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Referring to the development of the DPRK-China friendly relations he went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung together with the revolutionaries of the elder generations of China including Chairman Mao Zedong and Premier Zhou Enlai provided China-DPRK relations of friendship.
					
					 The Chinese people are deeply admiring him.
					
					 The relations have steadily developed under the great concern of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will shine forever.
					
					 We will make positive efforts to further develop the traditional friendship with the DPRK in the future, too.

articles.title: DPRK Named by Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
DPRK Named by Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the 64th anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (September 9), the national flag is hoisted all over the country.
					 When building a new country, President Kim Il Sung suggested naming it the DPRK, in consideration of the main object and the immediate tasks of the Korean revolution.
					
					 But the reactionaries alleged that the country's name was too lengthy and the word "people" should be omitted, in a bid to hinder the establishment of a genuine people's government and the building of a democratic, independent and sovereign state and satisfy their political greed.
					
					 The President resolutely rejected their allegation. He stated that the new country should be an independent and sovereign state based on democracy and national unity and, thereupon, it should be called Democratic People's Republic.
					
					 On September 9, Juche 37 (1948), he proclaimed the birth of the DPRK, a country where the popular masses are masters and everything serves them.
					
					 Since the foundation of the DPRK its people had successfully carried on the building of new Korea, won victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953) and turned the DPRK into a socialist industrial country, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, under his wise guidance.
					
					 The DPRK will remain forever as Kim Il Sung's Korea, true to his lifetime idea and cause.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Building DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Building DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- September 9 will mark the 64th anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					 On this occasion the Korean people are recalling the enduring feats performed by him for state building.
					
					 In the days of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, Kim Il Sung established traditions of building a people's power after advancing the idea and line on building a Juche-based power.
					
					 Even under the complex situation just after the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, he maintained the idea of national independence and worked heart and soul to rally all the countrymen by dint of distinguished statecraft and great generosity.
					
					 He declared the founding of the DPRK on Sept. 9, Juche 37 (1948), on the basis of solid political and military foundations for building an independent and sovereign state. 
					
					 The founding signaled the birth of people's country, socialist Korea, for the first time in the East and paved a way for building the Juche-based socialist nation.
					
					 Since then, the country has developed into a full-fledged independent and sovereign state.
					
					 Basing himself on the Juche idea, Kim Il Sung turned the DPRK government into a power that represents the independent rights of the popular masses, ensures their creative abilities and activities and protects their interests.
					
					 The DPRK owes itself to the outstanding idea and leadership of the President, and it will always shine with his idea and cause.

articles.title: Weather Forecast in DPRK
articles.content:
Weather Forecast in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Most areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will be affected by a weak anti-cyclone moving southeast from the northern part of the West Sea of Korea between Sept. 9 and 11.
					 They will be affected by a cyclone, expected to pass through the central part of the country, between Sept. 12 and 16.
					
					 Rainfall is forecast in most areas of the country on Sept. 12-13 and in the northern inland areas only on Sept. 14.
					
					 The temperature will be as good as that of the average year until Sept. 12 and 2 to 3 degrees Celsius lower than the average on Sept. 13-14.

articles.title: Work to Clear Aftermath of Typhoon-15 Stepped Up in Komdok Mining Complex
articles.content:
Work to Clear Aftermath of Typhoon-15 Stepped Up in Komdok Area
						
 Tanchon, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Komdok area has kicked off big efforts to clear the aftermath of typhoon-15 to resume the production.
					 Soldiers launched a rehabilitation drive and the Komdok Mining Complex and the Ryongyang Mine have put primary efforts into stabilizing the miners' living while repairing pits and machines and equipment and removing heaps of muck and mud.
					
					 Officials and workers of the complex cleared out in a few days over 20 000 cubic meters of debris and mud piled up inside Kumgol Railway Station.
					
					 The first-stage pumping station of the third dressing plant and pumping stations of the second dressing plant have been recovered and drainage operation is at its height.
					
					 The repair branch of the complex resumed the operation of the induction furnace, ensuring the production of parts for the repair and maintenance of damaged equipment.
					
					 The workers of the complex laid 6 000 cubic meters of earth on the road extending more than 4 km in districts Nos. 2 and 3, helping resume the traffic.
					
					 The Ryongyang Mine has fired up three light burning furnaces.
					
					 Thanks to the efforts of servicemen, officials and workers of the complex, the aftermath of the typhoon is being cleared and preparations are in progress for production.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Observed at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Observed at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
						
 Moscow, September 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Moscow hosted a reception on Thursday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Present there on invitation were vice-minister of Finance, deputies to the State Duma and members of the Federation Council of Russia, and personages of the United Russia Party, A Just Russia, the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, the Party for Peace and Unity, the All-Union  Communist Party of Bolsheviks, the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, ministries of Foreign Affairs, Defence and Interior, the Ministry of Regional Development, the Ministry of Economy and Development, ministries of Finance, Culture, Extraordinary Situation and Agriculture, the Ministry of Education and Science, the Moscow City Government, the "Russian Railways" Company, Gazprom, the Institute of the Far East of the Russian Academy of Sciences, the Veterans Association of Moscow, the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, the Federation of International Charity Organizations "World of Goodwill" and officials of the Un
					
					 ited Confederation of Koreans in Russia.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length painting of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.
					
					 Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia, said it was thanks to Kim Il Sung who founded the DPRK that the Korean people came to live a worthwhile life as masters of their own destiny, power and the country for the first time in their history spanning 5 000 years.
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its dignity and might as an independent powerful state under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and       Kim Jong Il, he stressed.
					
					 He reiterated his will to invariably boost the DPRK-Russia friendly and cooperative relations with a long history and tradition in the future, too, in line with the joint documents signed by the top leaders of the two countries and in the spirit of the treaty signed between the two states.
					
					 Karlov, director of the Consular Department of the Russian Foreign Ministry, praised the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries as good relations tested by history, adding that the Russia-DPRK relations have reached a new phase of their development with the summit in 2011 as an occasion and they are growing stronger in different fields under the care of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 He expressed hope that the friendly Korean people would achieve great success in their socio-economic development and enjoy happiness and prosperity under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S. Fails in Its Moves to Isolate Iran
articles.content:
U.S. Fails in Its Moves to Isolate Iran
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- With no force can the imperialist powers weaken the might of the world independent forces against imperialism. 
					 This is clearly evidenced by the 16th Summit of the Non-Aligned Movement held in Iran some days ago.
					
					 As proven, the U.S. has conspired with Western countries in its desperate efforts to internationally isolate Iran and suffocate its economy under the pretext of its nuclear issue.
					
					 The summit held in Iran against this backdrop aroused great concern of big powers.
					
					 The U.S. and Israel tried hard to deter leaders of some non-aligned countries and the UN secretary general from taking part in the summit, saying that their visits of Iran will be a "great mistake".
					
					 Nevertheless, all 120 member states of NAM took part in the summit despite the vicious challenge of the U.S. and the West.
					
					 The recent NAM Summit called for opposing the U.S. and the West's high-handed and arbitrary practices and unilateralism, and strengthening unity and solidarity among the NAM countries in their efforts to establish a fair and new international order.
					
					 Seyed Ali Khamenei, leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran, said that the U.S. and the Western countries are abusing the UN in a sinister bid to force the world to follow their view on value. He called on NAM to play bigger role in the international arena as required by the new era.
					
					 Many speakers accused big powers of meddling in the internal affairs of developing countries in a bid to deter them from their democratic development, and strongly hoped for the reform of the UN and the international financial system which are being swayed over by the U.S. and the West.
					
					 Parties concerned commented that the U.S. and the Western powers failed to isolate Iran from the world and block the unity of independent forces against imperialism.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Harshly Criticizes U.S. Presence in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Harshly Criticizes U.S. Presence in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicated a bylined article to the 67th anniversary of the occupation of south Korea by the U.S. imperialist aggression forces.
					 The article called the history of the U.S. military presence in south Korea as one of shuddering crimes by which the sovereignty and dignity of the Korean nation were ruthlessly violated and national reunification was checked.
					
					 The U.S. ulterior intention is to turn south Korea into its colonial military base and stronghold for invading the whole of Korea and, furthermore, seize supremacy over the Asian-Pacific region.
					
					 After taking over south Korea, the U.S. let its old stooges to hold control of all fields of policy, economy, military and culture to make them serve its aggression purpose. Meanwhile it equipped puppet forces with modern war means to prod them to anti-DPRK provocations.
					
					 After the Korean War, it concluded "mutual defense pact" with the south Korean puppet forces in a bid to permanently hold the half of the Korean Peninsula, insisting on the nonexistent "threat of southward invasion".
					
					 By the U.S. never-changed hostile policy toward the DPRK and its military presence in south Korea, the vicious cycle of confrontation and escalation of tension has repeated and the danger of a nuclear war has reached the extremes in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. created the Lee Myung Bak regime opposing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in south Korea and controlled the puppets behind the scene, fueling the ruin of relations between the north and the south and inciting war provocation rackets.
					
					 The article said a huge hurdle will remain in the road for detente and peace in the peninsula and the improvement of north-south relations as long as the U.S. forces are present in south Korea, strengthening their political and military control of it and instigating the south Korean ruling quarters to the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is an urgent task to get the U.S. forces withdrawn from the south and put an end to the pro-U.S. submissive and treacherous policy of south Korean conservatives, said the article.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Only when the U.S. troops are pulled out of south Korea as early as possible, is it possible to ensure peace and security of the Korean Peninsula as well as Asia and other parts of the world, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article. The article was dedicated to the 67th anniversary of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' occupation of south Korea. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is entirely unjust that the U.S. forces are still present in south Korea.
					
					 Removal of U.S. forces from south Korea is an obligation of the U.S. under international law.
					
					 The present situation shows that the pullout of foreign forces is becoming a trend in a global scale.
					
					 Hence, withdrawal of U.S. troops from south Korea is in conformity with the trend of the times oriented towards peace.
					
					 If the U.S. forces are pulled out of south Korea, it will not only root out the main cause menacing peace on the Korean Peninsula and remove the worst obstacle in the way of reunification, but create favorable circumstances for the Korean nation to independently and peacefully reunify the country.
					
					 In case a war breaks out in Korea, it will inevitably expand to other regions in the world. Then, it is clear that it would disturb the peace and security not only of the Korean Peninsula but Asia and other parts of the world. If the U.S. forces are removed from south Korea, the most dangerous hotspot will be disappeared from the world and this will be beneficial for ensuring its peace and security.
					
					 The U.S. military presence in south Korea also lays a serious stumbling block in the realization of denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula as it is a product of U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The more impudently the U.S. acts regarding the nuclear issue, the more difficult it will be to settle the issue of denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The pullout of U.S. forces from south Korea serves as a touchstone showing whether the U.S. has an intention to set right its hostile policy toward the DPRK and hopes for reunification of Korea or not.
					
					 The U.S. had better face up to the reality and make a correct option.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak-Park Geun Hye Talks for Conspiracy Denounced
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak-Park Geun Hye Talks for Conspiracy Denounced
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- There were tete-a-tete talks between traitor Lee Myung Bak and "presidential candidate" from the "Saenuri Party" Park Geun Hye in Chongwadae in south Korea some days ago.
					 Chongwadae and the "Saenuri Party" said that typhoon damage, child sexual assaults and registration fee issues were discussed there.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says that 20 minutes will be enough to discuss those issues but they were closeted for more than one hour.
					
					 The exhaustive talks hint that besides the publicized issues, they discussed matters related to the "presidential elections", the issue of the conservative regime's stay in power, to be more specific, the bylined commentary of the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 The "Saenuri Party's" stay in power is common desire of Lee who is keen on his security after his office and Park who seeks the coalition of the conservative forces.
					
					 It is for this reason that Lee and Park who were at odds being locked in the scramble for power in the past have sat together for talks.
					
					 The behind-the-door talks in Chongwadae disclosed the deceptive nature of Park who has so far mocked at the people, crying out for "discrimination" and "reform" in her relations with Lee.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party's" stay in office will bring the second "yusin" dictatorial regime, the paper says, stressing that the south Koreans never want it as they spent nightmare-like days under the Lee regime.
					
					 Minju Joson says Lee and Park sought their own interests at the Chongwadae talks, insisting that they should make public what they discussed at the talks and immediately back down from the political arena as demanded by south Koreans.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Japanese Senior Official's Outbursts
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Japanese Senior Official's Outbursts 
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Matsubara, chairman of the National Public Safety Commission of Japan, expressed his view on proposing to reexamine the 1993 Kono Statement clarifying Japan's apology and repentance of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. He expressed this view at the budget committee of the House of Councilors on Aug. 27.
					 This was a barbarous action of rubbing salt into the wounds of the victims of the sexual slavery which still remain unhealed though a long period has passed since then and, at the same time, a dastardly act to hide the issue of the sexual slavery at any cost.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists forcibly took away women of different countries including 200 000 Korean women to their battlefields for aggression and committed all sorts of sordid acts against them, mercilessly violating their dignity. These crimes have already been disclosed before the whole world through the historical data, witnesses and victims' testimonies.
					
					 Kono made the above-said statement at a time when Japan was in a position not to dodge the blame any longer as the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was under hot discussion worldwide and there were growing voices demanding its official apology and reparation for the crimes.
					
					 This being a hard historical fact, Japan is trying hard to retract Kono's statement nearly 20 years later, stunning the world community.
					
					 Such action is a reckless one intended to totally deny the sexual slavery, discarding even the spurious signboard of inheriting Kono's statement though Japan has so far put up ostensively.
					
					 This is not the first time that Japan expressed its intention to retract his statement, displeased with it.
					
					 The "Dietmen's League for Japan's future and education in history", Japan's right-wing conservative body, asserted the need to verify the statement, claiming that the statement reflects the view of an individual and there are not a few Dietmen who are skeptical about it and it is good to let the new chief Cabinet secretary issue a statement.
					
					 This is nothing but part of a sinister trick to keep its past crimes buried into oblivion.
					
					 The above-said sexual slavery was the unprecedented organized and institutional crime against humanity as it was perpetrated by Japan with government and military power involved, pursuant to its war-time state policy.
					
					 No matter how desperately the Japanese reactionaries may try to whitewash the crime-woven past and cover up their sexual slavery, the worst human traffic in the 20th century, this is a historical fact which can neither be ignored nor written off.
					
					 That is why not only Asian countries but the rest of the world consider this as serious crimes and strongly demand Japan make an apology and reparation for its crimes.
					
					 It is an extremely abnormal thing that the above-said crimes of Japan remain unsettled even in the new century.
					
					 Japan's stance towards this issue sharply contrasts with the attitude of some countries including Germany towards the reparation for their past wrongdoings.
					
					 Japan will always remain a brazen-faced country in history and in the eyes of mankind as long as it is unwilling to redress its past crimes.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Calls for Not Allowing Emergence of Second Yusin Regime
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Calls for Not Allowing Emergence of Second Yusin Regime 
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A paper on which traitor Park Chung-Hee swore his loyalty to Japanese imperialism in blood was disclosed in the library of the Japanese Diet recently.
					 This discovery is undeniable evidence proving the true despicable nature of Park who joined the Japanese imperialists in their moves to exterminate the Korean nation as "a special class pro-Japanese" lackey.
					
					 According to the information available from the Institute for National Studies of south Korea in November 2009, a Manchurian paper on March 31, 1939 said "Park Chung-Hee who volunteered to join the Imperial Japanese Army in North Kyongsang Province was omitted from the list of the first batch of volunteers due to the excess of age but was enlisted in 1939 after he presented a letter containing his pledge made in blood." The recently disclosed paper confirmed the truth, noting that it was completely identical to the information carried by the newspaper at that time.
					
					 At a time when the patriots of Korea waged a bloody struggle for the liberation of the nation from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, Park Chung-Hee presented a paper on which he swore his loyalty to the Japanese king in blood, becoming a dirty running dog of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					  When Park who was attending the Army Military Academy of Japan by the Japanese name "Okamoto," Lieut. General of the Japanese army who was director of the academy said that "Okamoto was a man rare to be found even among Japanese as he was so devoted and loyal to the emperor of Japan."
					
					  The history records the facts that Park served as officer of the Imperial Japanese Army, shouting: "I vow to fall down like cherry flowers". He participated in more than 110 "punitive operations" against patriots of Korea, earning an ill-fame as "commander of the Okamoto shock brigade".  
					
					 After the defeat of the Japanese imperialists, Park disguised himself as a stooge of the U.S. imperialists after vowing to "share his destiny with the Stars and Stripes." 
					
					 He as a special agent demonstrated his skill in putting down the soldiers mutiny in Ryosu waged by patriotic soldiers of south Korea in 1948. He brutally suppressed the people's struggle for the country's reunification in south Korea after the April 19 Popular Uprising. 
					
					 When south Korean people turned out in a nation-wide struggle for the country's reunification in May 1961, loudly shouting "Let us go to the north, come to the south and meet at Panmunjom!" the Park military junta arrested, detained and killed more than 130 000 patriotic people, dissolved 23 political parties and 238 social organizations and forcibly closed many media organizations in less than one month. 
					
					 Yusin dictator Park blustered "he could never pardon anyone freely talking about unification as tragedy of unification is bigger than that of division."
					
					 He fabricated the criminal "south Korea-Japan agreement" with the Japanese reactionaries, bringing again Japanese aggressor forces, his old masters, to south Korea. He thus threw greater obstacles in the way of the country's reunification and reducing south Korea to a dual colony of the U.S. and Japan. 
					
					 This cannot but be a tragedy of history and shame on the nation.
					
					 The "yusin system" should be judged down through generations. 
					
					 However, south Korea is now witnessing such tragedy as praising Park and whitewashing the "yusin" dictatorship. 
					
					 Running in the vein of the "Saenuri Party" is the blood of "the yusin" dictator steeped in fascist dictatorship, treachery and anti-reunification crimes.  
					
					 The Korean nation still remains divided into two though nearly 70 years have passed since its split. This is attributable to the successive descendants of such despicable "yusin" in power who have worked hard to perpetuate the division and pursued confrontation with compatriots, colluding with outside forces.
					
					 Consequently, the Korean nation has lost decades in its development, suffering untold hardships, misfortune, sacrifices and losses.
					
					 The remnants of "yusin" who stake their fate on the forthcoming "presidential election" are making desperate efforts to realize their dirty scenario to stay in power. The clan of the "Saenuri Party" is keen to cover up its true colors as despicable traitors under the motto of "revamping." But its sycophantic and unpopular nature can never change no matter how many times it may disguise itself.
					
					 Unless the ultra-right conservative forces greedy for power are ousted, the north-south confrontation will be escalated and a war is bound to break out, much less expecting the realization of the aspiration of the people for progress and reforms in south Korea.
					
					 The nation should force the "yusin" dictators, predecessors of the "Saenuri Party", to pay for all their monstrous crimes committed in the past.
					
					 All the Koreans will never allow the appearance of the second "yusin regime" in south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Ground Exercises to Be Staged
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Ground Exercises to Be Staged
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Units 6953 and 3190 of the south Korean puppet army announced that they would stage ground exercises in the area of Mugon-ri, Phaju City of Kyonggi Province between Sept. 10 and 14, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Timed to coincide with the war hysteria of the 17th Division of the puppet army, this saber-rattling will reportedly involve a lot of war hardware including military vehicles and tanks.
					
					 The projected reckless war exercises for invading the north are quite contrary to the desire of all Koreans for peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Carried by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Carried by Foreign Newspapers
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Pakistani Baluchistan Times carried the main content of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People".
					 The work, made public on April 20, 2012, clarifies the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetimes. It also indicates the tasks for firmly preserving and eternally glorifying their ideas and feats.
					
					 The Russian Patriot No. 33, a Nepalese paper on August 30 and the Congolese L'Avenir on August 31 carried the full text or the gist of his work "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Advancing under the Uplifted Immortal Banners Bearing Portraits of the Smiling Great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il".
					
					 In a speech given at the banquet given to celebrate August 25, 2012, the 52nd anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership, Kim Jong Un clarified the Songun feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He stressed the need to vigorously strive for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun pioneered and led to victory by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Posted on Internet Website of Belarusian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Posted on Internet Website of Belarusian Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Communist Workers' Party of Belarus on August 25 posted on its Internet homepage the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People".
					 The work, made public on April 20, 2012, clarifies the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetimes. It also indicates the tasks for firmly preserving and eternally glorifying their ideas and feats.
					
					 Posted in the homepage was a congratulatory speech made by Kim Jong Un at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations to celebrate the 66th KCU anniversary on June 6, 2012.
					
					 He in his speech expressed firm will to invariably carry forward the noble outlook of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the younger generation and future and indicated the tasks and ways for preparing the KCU members as reserves knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy who will shoulder upon themselves the future of the country and the nation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Nation-Building Introduced by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Nation-Building Introduced by Foreign Media
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Paper and Internet homepages of Russia, Germany and Nigeria dedicated articles to the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The Russian paper Patriot No. 33 devoted two whole pages to "Event on September 9, 1948" and other articles under the bannerline "It became a powerful country, anniversary of DPRK" with portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and a portrait of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It deals with the history of victory and glory traversed by the DPRK.
					
					 A travel company of Germany posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism" on August 29.
					
					 With deep insight into the requirement of the era and the developing revolution Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea, the article said, adding Kim Jong Il constantly developed it in depth with his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Kim Il Sung, eternal President of DPRK" on August 24. The article said:
					
					 Today the Korean people are holding Kim Il Sung as the eternal President of the DPRK in high esteem.  Kim Il Sung is father of socialist Korea which is demonstrating its might as a political, ideological, military, scientific and technological power in the world.        
					
					 He independently settled all the issues arising in state building under the uplifted banner of independence, self-support and self-reliance.
					
					 The feats performed by him in building the socialist system centered on the popular masses in which the people have become masters of everything and everything serves them in Korea will shine long.

articles.title: Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Introduced by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Introduced by Nigerian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism" on August 25.
					 The revolutionary ideas of President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, which are recognized as the great guiding idea in the era of independence, were formulated as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea, with deep understanding of the demand of the new era in which the oppressed and maltreated popular masses have emerged as the master of their destiny.
					
					 Kim Jong Il comprehensively systematized the Juche idea with his energetic ideological and theoretical activities. He developed in depth the Songun idea and put forward the theory of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The revolutionary ideas of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are inseparable and it is too natural to call them Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The Juche idea is the important component of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and constitutes its essence.
					
					 The theory of Songun politics and the theory of building a thriving socialist nation which reflect the requirement of the developing revolution in the present times hold an important position in Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Crimes Censured by British Organizations
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Crimes Censured by British Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a joint statement on August 30 in connection with the disclosure of the fact that the U.S. imperialists cooked up a criminal scheme to use nuclear weapons against Koreans during the past Fatherland Liberation War.
					 According to the recently declassified April 20, 1951 report worked out by the FBI, the U.S. imperialists, unable to bring down the heroic Korean People's Army in the past Korean war by dint of military muscle and technological advantages, cooked up the base plan to create a "no-man area", a death area prohibiting access by anyone, by spraying a huge quantity of radioactive materials in order to arrest the re-advance of the KPA and divide the Korean Peninsula into two, the statement recalled.
					
					 This is the thrice-cursed war criminal act as atrocious as the U.S. imperialists' use of bio-chemical weapons and massacres in Sinchon during the Korean war, it said.
					
					 The above-said crimes prove that the U.S. is, indeed, a criminal and a terrorist nation, it noted, adding the U.S. imperialists are the chieftain of world imperialism, wrecker of world peace, violator of national sovereignty and sworn enemy of the Korean people and humankind.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. apologize for the crimes it committed in Korea and withdraw its forces from south Korea.
					
					 The grave provocation of the U.S. staging the ceaseless military exercises targeted against the DPRK proves how just it was when it decided to continue bolstering its nuclear deterrent, the statement concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang 
						
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio con su esposa   Ri Sol Ju el Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang a punto de inauguracion. 
					El Parque, enclavado en un vasto terreno alrededor de las ruinas del Palacio Real Anhak del monte Paektu, es un museo de historia al aire libre que permite ver y experimentar directamente la historia de la nacion coreana y sus costumbres.
					
					Se divide en la zona de educacion general en la historia, la de exposicion de vestigios historicos, la contemporanea, la folclorica, la de juegos folcloricos, la de parques de los montes Paektu y Kumgang y la de administracion. 
					
					El Mariscal recibio el parte sobre la finalizacion exitosa de la construccion del Parque y recorrio varios lugares. 
					
					En la zona de educacion general en la historia, situada en la entrada del Parque, vio la tabla grafica en forma de pintura mural de gran tamano. 
					
					La excelente nacionalidad la adquirio el pueblo coreano en el largo periodo historico de su desarrollo independiente, dijo el Mariscal y agrego que cuando lo sepan bien, las generaciones venideras podran guardar en lo profundo del corazon el espiritu de dar primacia a la nacion coreana.
					
					En la zona de exposicion de vestigios historicos paso revista a los dibujos y chozas que muestran la vida de los hombres primitivos, la tumba de Tangun, los dolmenes y el punal de forma de Pipha (instrumento musical coreano parecido a mandolin) de la era de Cojoson (Corea Antigua), la tumba del rey Tongmyong, la lapida del Mausoleo del rey Kwanggaetho y la pagoda del templo Kumgang de la era de Coguryo, la pagoda del templo Miruk de Paekje, la del templo Hwangryong de Silla y la lampara de piedra de Sanggyong del periodo de Palhae. 
					
					Llegado a la zona contemporanea, el Mariscal vio de cerca y de lejos las miniaturas de la Plaza      Kim Il Sung, el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo, el Museo de la Revolucion Coreana, el Teatro de Arte Mansudae, el Complejo Hidraulico del Mar Oeste, etc. escuchando con satisfaccion que han sido corregidos los defectos senalados por el durante su visita realizada en enero pasado. 
					
					Viendo la maqueta de la casa natal del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu, resalto la necesidad de plantar los arboles adecuados al edificio para reproducir el ambiente periferico y demarcar bien los edificios.
					
					Ante la miniatura del Museo de la Revolucion Coreana, dijo que los visitantes al lugar pensaran primero en las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en la colina Mansu y apunto que deben instalarlas aqui tambien y describir mejor los conjuntos escultoricos de temas secundarios. 
					
					Hay que acondicionar Phanmunjom, simbolo de division nacional, para que los visitantes redoblen la decision de reunificar sin falta la patria en nuestra generacion, puntualizo. 
					
					El Parque Folclorico tiene gran dimension y por eso, hay que construir la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones, el Teatro del Pueblo y otros edificios nuevos o faltantes, indico.
					
					En la zona folclorica, se mostro satisfecho de que se hayan reconstruido in statu quo los edificios arquitectonicos representativos de la era primitiva, Cojoson y la edad media y de los periodos de Coguryo y Coryo. 
					
					Entrado en el edificio gubernamental de Coguryo, el Mariscal aprecio que este edificio se ha construido bien en el principio historicista, diciendo que si colocan en la entrada las miniaturas de soldados en uniforme militar de Cocuyo, los visitantes podran imaginar la sociedad de aquel entonces. 
					
					Luego, el Mariscal recorrio el Museo Folklorico de Corea trasladado al Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang. 
					
					Despues de pasar por el Palacio de Palhae, vio las reliquias historicas descubiertas en el curso de construccion por los militares de la gran unidad combinada 630 del EPC participantes en la obra y los bosquejos creados por ellos. 
					
					En este parque a punto de inauguracion, se me hace mas fuerte la anoranza al General Kim Jong Il, dijo y agrego que cuan magnifico habria sido, si hubiese venido con el que propuso personalmente la obra. 
					
					Destaco la necesidad de gestionar bien el parque para infundir en los habitantes, los jovenes y ninos escolares el espiritu Juche y la nacionalidad. 
					
					Es preciso construir la zona mundial para que los visitantes puedan ver los edificios arquitectonicos de varios paises del mundo y tomar ricos conocimientos sobre la historia y las tradiciones de los paises extranjeros, enseno. 
					
					Ese dia, el Mariscal vio el concierto con pipiritanas "Cancion de defensa a ultranza al lider interpretada dirigiendose al Palacio del Sol de Kumsusan", ofrecido por los militares de la gran unidad combinada 630 del EPC. 
					
					El Mariscal expreso agradecimiento del Comandante Supremo del EPC a esa unidad, que en la construccion del parque, puso de pleno manifiesto el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y el de materializacion a ultranza, calificandola del gran destacamento que realizo brillantes meritos laborales en el frente avanzado de la construccion socialista. 
					
					El fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Kim Kyong Ok, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So, Kim Pyong Ho y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige el Centro Deportivo de la Avenida Thongil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige el Centro Deportivo de la Avenida Thongil
						
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno con su esposa Ri Sol Ju el Centro Deportivo de la Avenida Thongil en visperas de inauguracion.
					Esta moderna instalacion de deportes masivos fue construida por la iniciativa y el proyecto del Mariscal quien presta siempre profunda atencion al fomento de salud publica y al mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo.
					
					El centro con una superficie arquitectonica de 13 mil 749consta de las salas de deportes para la salud, la de ultrasonido acustico, la de rehabilitacion, la de ping-pong, la refresqueria, etc.
					
					En el estan instalados 138 equipos de 61 tipos para la carrera, ciclismo, remo y otros deportes, ademas de modernos aparatos de tratamiento medico.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos del centro, el Mariscal se entero detalladamente del estado de dotacion, distribucion y el plan de uso de los equipos deportivos. 
					
					Dando vueltas por las salas deportivas para la salud en el primer y segundo pisos, se cercioro de las especificaciones de los equipos.
					
					Viendo uno tras otro varios equipos deportivos, senalo que es importante ubicarlos racionalmente conforme al caracter del centro.
					
					Hay que buscar y aplicar activamente los cientificos metodos de uso, convenientes a las edades y caracteristicas fisicas de las personas, en cooperacion con los especialistas para que los trabajadores se forjen fisicamente y se curen usando los equipos deportivos, instruyo.
					
					En la sala de rehabilitacion, dijo que cuando los empleados adquieran los conocimientos especializados como la fisioterapia, podran contribuir bien al fomento de salud publica y al tratamiento de los habitantes.
					
					En la sala deportiva para la salud en el tercer piso, la evaluo de mejor que las acondicionadas en las plantas bajas.
					
					Diciendo que los equipos para la carrera y el ciclismo tienen buena calidad, apunto que si los jovenes y ninos escolares y hasta los oficinistas practican los deportes y reciben tratamiento aqui, podran dedicarse saludables a sus tareas revolucionarias.
					
					En su recorrido por la sala de ultrasonido acustico donde fueron instalados modernos equipos de ultrasonido, que incentivan cada parte del cuerpo humano, y los de sauna en humedo y seco y la ducha, resalto la importancia de mejorar los servicios para que los trabajadores puedan tener buenos resultados en los ejercicios de deportes y el tratamiento medico.
					
					Hacer al pueblo coreano, el mejor del mundo, vivir en la opulencia bajo el regimen socialista, esto es la firme decision y voluntad del partido, senalo y destaco que se debe operar bien el Centro Deportivo de la Avenida Thongil para que aqui resuenen mas alto las risas felices del pueblo.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Kyong Ok, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Hu Jintao
						
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, y Choe Yong Rim, primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, recibieron un mensaje de felicitacion que les enviaran juntos el dia 8 Hu Jintao, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China y de la Comision Militar Central, Wu Bangguo, presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional, y Wen Jiabao, primer ministro del Consejo de Estado.
					El texto sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, extendemos la calurosa felicitacion a ustedes, y por su conducto, al PTC, al gobierno y al hermano pueblo de Corea en representacion del PCCh, el gobierno y pueblo de China.
					
					Con la fundacion de la RPDC, el pueblo coreano pudo emprender el camino de construccion del Estado socialista y escribir la nueva pagina de la historia coreana.
					
					Durante mas de 60 anos, el pueblo coreano ha logrado exitos loables en la causa de construccion del socialismo al estilo coreano bajo la guia del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Secretario General     Kim Jong Il y el PTC.
					
					Hoy dia, el pueblo coreano acelera energicamente la construccion del Estado prospero explorando la via de manera emprendedora y redoblando los esfuerzos, unido monoliticamente en torno al camarada Kim Jong Un y al PTC.
					
					Deseamos de todo corazon que Corea siga logrando nuevos y mayores exitos en todos los dominios.
					
					China y Corea son vecinos amistosos que comparten montes y rios.
					
					Se fortalece cada dia mas la tradicional amistad China-Corea, preparada y cultivada por los dirigentes de veterana generacion de los dos paises, y se manifiesta su nueva vitalidad en la nueva epoca y la nueva situacion.
					
					Segun el espiritu de "continuacion de tradiciones, aspiracion al futuro, buena vecindad amistad y fortalecimiento de cooperacion", contribuiremos al mejor bienestar de los pueblos de los dos paises y a la duradera estabilidad, prosperidad y desarrollo de la region, al profundizar el intercambio y la cooperacion sustanciales en todas las ramas de ambos paises y promover el desarrollo de las relaciones bilaterales.
					
					Hacemos votos por la prosperidad de la RPDC y la felicidad de su pueblo.

articles.title: Acto central por el 64o aniversario de fundacion de RPDC
articles.content:
Acto central por el 64o aniversario de fundacion de RPDC 
						
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Asistieron al acto Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, innovadores laborales y los trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					Tambien se distinguian los compatriotas residentes en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, los representantes de las organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					La fundacion de la RPDC por el Presidente       Kim Il Sung el 9 de septiembre de 1948 fue la declaracion solemne del nacimiento de la Corea popular, primer pais del pueblo en el Oriente colonizado, y un gran acontecimiento que dio inicio a la construccion de Estado socialista centrado en las masas populares, comenzo el premier y prosiguio:
					
					Gracias al evento, nuestro pais, que habia perdido sus brillos en el mapa mundial, se ha presentado en la arena internacional como digno Estado soberano e independiente, y el pueblo coreano se hizo por primera vez en la historia el verdadero dueno del Estado y la sociedad y pudo tener una herramienta politica con que puede llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Al continuar con fidelidad la idea y la causa de construccion del Estado del Presidente, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presento la original teoria de la misma materia basada en la concepcion revolucionaria del lider y la materializo cabalmente, de manera que la RPDC se fortaleciera como Estado de Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Hizo enaltecer a Kim Il Sung como Eterno Presidente de la RPDC y resolver todos los problemas que se presentaban en la construccion y las actividades del Estado segun el proposito del Presidente y por su estilo.
					
					Con esta proeza extraordinaria, sento la garantia para glorificar eternamente la RPDC como Estado de Kim Il Sung y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					En el periodo mas severo de la revolucion coreana, el Dirigente presento la politica de Songun como principal modo politico de la RPDC y establecio la estructura de aparatos estatales centrada en la defensa nacional. De esta manera, consolido extraordinariamente el poderio estatal, frustro las maniobras agresivas de los imperialistas y defendio con firmeza el destino de la patria y nacion. 
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un denomino con el nombre de Kim Jong Il el patriotismo mostrado por este en su camino de abnegacion por la defensa de la patria y la prosperidad del pais y llama a todo el ejercito y el pueblo a la lucha por materializarlo. 
					
					Bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, la RPDC frustrara los brutales desafios y las maniobras obstructoras de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion dentro y fuera del pais y cumplira sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion. 
					
					Responder a la provocacion con el inmediato contraataque y a la guerra de agresion con la justa guerra por la reunificacion de la patria, esto es la posicion de principios y la firme voluntad de la RPDC. 
					
					De desatarse la nueva guerra, que no deseamos, debido a las acciones imprudentes de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos, los militares y civiles coreanos les daran el inmediato contraataque demoledor sin perder esa oportunidad y pasaran a la gran guerra por la reunificacion de la patria para cumplir el deseo supremo de la nacion coreana y eliminar totalmente el bastion del imperialismo del globo terraqueo.
